```{r} 
## Airfare Table

dim(airfare_df)
glimpse(airfare_df)

names(airfare_df) <- str_replace_all(tolower(names(airfare_df)), "`","")

```

```{r}
## On-time Performance Table
time_performance <- read_csv("Final Flights Data/Airline on-time perform(2015-2019).csv")
#View(time_performance)

names(time_performance)
glimpse(time_performance)

names(time_performance) <- str_replace_all(tolower(names(time_performance)), "`","")
names(time_performance) <- str_replace_all(tolower(names(time_performance)), " ","_")


time_performance$total_number <- 
  as.integer(gsub(",","",time_performance$total_number))

time_performance$`average_departure_delay_(minutes)` <- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`average_departure_delay_(minutes)`))

time_performance$`average_taxi-out_time_(minutes)` <- 
  as.double(gsub(",","", time_performance$`average_taxi-out_time_(minutes)`))

time_performance$`average_scheduled_departure_to_take-off_(minutes)`<- as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`average_scheduled_departure_to_take-off_(minutes)`))

time_performance$`average_arrival_delay_(minutes)`<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`average_arrival_delay_(minutes)`))

time_performance$`average_airborne_time_(minutes)`<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`average_airborne_time_(minutes)`))

time_performance$`average_taxi-in_time_(minutes)`<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`average_taxi-in_time_(minutes)`))

time_performance$total_number_cancelled<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$total_number_cancelled))

time_performance$percent_flights_cancelled<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$percent_flights_cancelled))

time_performance$total_number_diverted<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$total_number_diverted))

time_performance$percent_flights_diverted<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$percent_flights_diverted))

time_performance$diverted_flights_reaching_scheduled_destination<- as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$diverted_flights_reaching_scheduled_destination))

time_performance$`diverted_flights_(mins)`<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`diverted_flights_(mins)`))

time_performance$`cancelled_flights_(mins)` <- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`cancelled_flights_(mins)`))

time_performance$`carrier_(avg._mins)`<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`carrier_(avg._mins)`))

time_performance$`weather(avg._mins)`<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`weather(avg._mins)`))

time_performance$`national_aviation_system(avg._mins)`<- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`national_aviation_system(avg._mins)`))

time_performance$`security(avg._mins)` <- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`security(avg._mins)` ))

time_performance$`late_aircraft_arrival(avg._mins)` <- 
  as.double(gsub(",","",time_performance$`late_aircraft_arrival(avg._mins)`))
```

```{r}
## Cancellation Fees

                        col_types = cols(
  Year = col_double(),

  JetBlue = col_double(),
  Alaska = col_double(),
  Spirit = col_double(),
  Frontier = col_double(),
  `Virgin America` = col_double(),

  `Island Air Hawaii` = col_double(),
  `US Airways` = col_double()
))

View(cancel_fees)
```

```{r fig.height= 10}
airports_by_state <- airfare_df %>% group_by(state_name) %>% summarise(count = n(), avg_fare = mean(`average_fare_($)`))
ggplot(airports_by_state) +
  geom_col(aes(reorder(state_name, count), count, fill = avg_fare))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
  coord_flip()
```


```{r}
avg_fare_df <- airfare_df %>% group_by(year) %>% summarise(avg_fare = mean(`average_fare_($)`), count = n())

ggplot(avg_fare_df, aes(year, avg_fare, fill = count)) +
         geom_col()
```
```{r}
airports_by_city <- airfare_df %>% group_by(city_name) %>% 
  summarise(count = n(), avg_fare = mean(`average_fare_($)`)) %>% arrange(desc(count), desc(avg_fare))
airp_by_city <- airports_by_city[1:35,]

ggplot(airp_by_city) +
  geom_col(aes(reorder(city_name, count), count, fill = avg_fare))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
  coord_flip()
```

```{r fig.width= 10}
View(time_performance)
names(time_per_airlines )
time_per_year <- time_performance %>% group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(total_flights = sum(total_number, na.rm = T),
            total_flights_cancelled = sum(total_number_cancelled, na.rm = T),
            total_flights_diverted = sum(total_number_diverted, na.rm = T),
            avg_dep_delay = mean(`average_departure_delay_(minutes)`, na.rm = T),
            avg_taxi_out_time = mean(`average_taxi-out_time_(minutes)`, na.rm = T),
            avg_arr_delay = mean(`average_arrival_delay_(minutes)`, na.rm = T),
            weather_avg_delay = mean(`weather(avg._mins)`, na.rm = T),
            national_aviation_system_avg_delay = mean(`national_aviation_system(avg._mins)`, na.rm = T),
            security_avg_delay = mean(`security(avg._mins)`, na.rm = T),
            late_aircraft_arrival_avg_delay = mean(`late_aircraft_arrival(avg._mins)`, na.rm = T))

ggplot(time_per_year,aes(year, total_flights, fill = total_flights_cancelled))+
  geom_col() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```


```{r fig.width= 10}
p1 <- ggplot(time_per_year,aes(year, total_flights, fill = weather_avg_delay))+
  geom_col() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

p2 <- ggplot(time_per_year,aes(year, total_flights, fill = national_aviation_system_avg_delay))+
  geom_col() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

p3 <- ggplot(time_per_year,aes(year, total_flights, fill = security_avg_delay))+
  geom_col() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
p4 <- ggplot(time_per_year,aes(year, total_flights, fill = late_aircraft_arrival_avg_delay))+
  geom_col() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
gridExtra::grid.arrange(p1, p2, p3, p4, nrow = 2)
```

```{r fig.width=12, fig.height= 8}
time_per_airlines <- time_performance %>% group_by(carriers) %>% 
  summarise(total_flights = sum(total_number, na.rm = T),
            total_flights_cancelled = sum(total_number_cancelled, na.rm = T),
            total_flights_diverted = sum(total_number_diverted, na.rm = T),
            avg_dep_delay = mean(`average_departure_delay_(minutes)`, na.rm = T),
            avg_taxi_out_time = mean(`average_taxi-out_time_(minutes)`, na.rm = T),
            avg_arr_delay = mean(`average_arrival_delay_(minutes)`, na.rm = T),
            weather_avg_delay = mean(`weather(avg._mins)`, na.rm = T),
            national_aviation_system_avg_delay = mean(`national_aviation_system(avg._mins)`, na.rm = T),
            security_avg_delay = mean(`security(avg._mins)`, na.rm = T),
            late_aircraft_arrival_avg_delay = mean(`late_aircraft_arrival(avg._mins)`, na.rm = T))

p5 <- ggplot(time_per_airlines,aes(reorder(carriers,-weather_avg_delay), weather_avg_delay))+
  geom_col(fill = "dark blue") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

p6 <- ggplot(time_per_airlines,aes(reorder(carriers, -national_aviation_system_avg_delay), national_aviation_system_avg_delay))+
  geom_col(fill = "dark green") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="Dark2")

p7 <- ggplot(time_per_airlines,aes(reorder(carriers, -security_avg_delay),security_avg_delay))+
  geom_col(fill = "purple") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="Dark2")

p8 <- ggplot(time_per_airlines,aes(reorder(carriers, -late_aircraft_arrival_avg_delay), late_aircraft_arrival_avg_delay))+
  geom_col(fill = "maroon") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="Dark2")

gridExtra::grid.arrange(p5, p6, p7, p8, nrow = 2)
```

```{r fig.width= 8}
lf_by_month <- loadfct_df %>% group_by(month) %>% summarise(alaska_airlines_avg = mean(alaska_airlines),
                                             allegiant_airlines_avg = mean(allegiant_airlines),
                                             american_airlines_avg = mean(american_airlines),
                                             delta_airlines_avg = mean(delta_airlines),
                                             frontier_airlines_avg = mean(frontier_airlines),
                                             hawaiian_airlines_avg = mean(hawaiian_airlines),
                                             jetblue_airlines_avg = mean(jetblue_airlines),
                                             southwest_airlines_avg = mean(southwest_airlines),
                                             spirit_airlines_avg = mean(spirit_airlines),
                                             united_airlines_avg = mean(united_airlines))
                                             
                                        
ggplot(lf_by_month)+
  geom_line(aes(month,alaska_airlines_avg))+
  geom_line(aes(month,allegiant_airlines_avg), col = "cornflowerblue") +
  geom_line(aes(month,american_airlines_avg), col = "coral4") +
  geom_line(aes(month,delta_airlines_avg), col = "greenyellow") +
  geom_line(aes(month,frontier_airlines_avg), col = "deeppink4") +
  geom_line(aes(month,hawaiian_airlines_avg), col = "darkseagreen4") +
  geom_line(aes(month,jetblue_airlines_avg), col = "brown4") +
  geom_line(aes(month,southwest_airlines_avg), col = "darkorchid4") +
  geom_line(aes(month,spirit_airlines_avg), col = "orange4") +
  geom_line(aes(month,united_airlines_avg), col = "olivedrab")+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1, 12, 1))

```
